name: 3D NINJA TERRAIN GENERATOR
description:
Hi everyone , this is another game I made . In this one you are a ninja and you have to jump on the blocks and get as high as you can (its a highscore game),  plus still no use of the katana sorry. I hope you like this game .

Train in the art of the wall jump, but do try to mind the lava.

WASD to move
Arrows keys to turn, and look up/down 
Spacebar to jump

Orange blocks are bouncy, and blue blocks slow you down

BYE
